title: OpenGL surface inverted after upgrading to 1.60.0
body: After upgrading from 1.58 to 1.60, all my OpenGL views are being drawn inverted/mirrored. What was changed in between and what should I do to fix this issue?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: This change should have been seamless if you are using the SkiaSharp.Views... Or are you using custom views? I think something changed inside skia to make all the GL orientations consistent across platforms.

comments.author: DanWBR
comments.body: Custom views. At the time I've wrote my code you didn't have an OpenGL view for GTK#, so I had to write one from scratch.
